thread.title: In Newark school reform efforts, gains come at a price PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: In Newark school reform efforts, gains come at a price | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: In Newark school reform efforts, gains come at a price PBS NewsHour
text: Five years ago, Gov. Chris Christie, Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg and former Mayor Cory Booker launched an ambitious plan to remake Newark’s schools by creating a network of charter schools that would operate almost like a business -- a model they hoped could be adopted nationally. William Brangham speaks to Dale Russakoff about her new book, “The Prize,” which chronicles the reform efforts.
